meanings.definition: A large, heavy axe used in battle.
meanings.sent1: The warriors carried battleaxes into the fight.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed ancient battleaxes from different civilizations.
meanings.sent3: The knight accidentally dropped his battleaxe on his foot!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a sharp battleaxe against adversity.
meanings.sent5: The sound of battleaxes clashing echoed through the battlefield.

meanings.definition: To engage in a fierce confrontation or struggle.
meanings.sent1: The two rival factions battleaxes over control of the territory.
meanings.sent2: They battleaxes against each other in the final round of the competition.
meanings.sent3: The siblings battleaxes playfully over who gets the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: She battleaxes with her fears every day to achieve her goals.
meanings.sent5: The political parties battleaxes for dominance in the upcoming election.
